pr_title: [#10523] Edit session button should open the sessions page in edit mode

timeline.author: ccyccyccy

replies.bodyText: It is not necessary for the change to work. I changed it because I thought it would reflect the state better since the page will open in the editing mode after routing. On second thought, I will remove it.
replies.author: jasonbch

timeline.message: Change the state of the edit feedback session into edit mode after routing to edit feedback session
Change the state of the edit feedback session into edit mode after routing to edit feedback session
